# Foreword {-}

This document serves as a template for the creation of UNIGIS teaching materials in Quarto.

> **Note:**  
> This version of the template is intended for **public disclosure only**.  
> Some internal elements such as **logos and branding images** have been removed.  
> Authors working on actual course materials should use the **internal authoring version** of the template.

Further information on working with Quarto that is not contained in this document can be found in the [Quarto documentation](https://quarto.org/docs/guide/){target="_blank"}.
